'''Northlander Claymore Billet''' is a [[Forging Material]] used in [[forging]] 4-Star [[claymores]] of the [[Infusion Series]], [[Prototype Series]], [[Dragonspine Series]] and [[Amethyst Series]].

{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Midlander Claymore Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2

}}

}}
